content.rendered:
If you don’t want to lose important photos, videos, audio files, documents, or accidentally deleted apps on your Android device ー Dumpster is for you!

Dumpster is the fastest, easiest way for anyone to recover & restore media files. You can undelete anything in seconds. 

We know how your important photos are. Especially if you’re capturing once in a lifetime moments. Which is why Dumpster is perfect for:

  • Android Photographers
  • Families
  • Travelers
  • People with clumsy thumbs
  • Photo lovers
  • Content creators
  • Students
  • And more!

Never lose a photo or video again. Download Dumpster on the Google Play Store free today!
